trans-unit.source: Passenger flight on-time performance data taken from the TranStats data collection of the U.S. Department of Transportation (<html></html>On-Time<html></html>).<html></html> <html></html>The dataset covers the time period April-October 2013. Before uploading to Azure ML Studio, the dataset was processed as follows:<html></html><html></html>The dataset was filtered to cover only the 70 busiest airports in the continental US<html></html><html></html>Cancelled flights were labeled as delayed by more than 15 minutes<html></html><html></html>Diverted flights were filtered out<html></html><html></html>The following columns were selected: Year, Month, DayofMonth, DayOfWeek, Carrier, OriginAirportID, DestAirportID, CRSDepTime, DepDelay, DepDel15, CRSArrTime, ArrDelay, ArrDel15, Cancelled<html></html><html></html>
trans-unit.target: Passenger flight on-time performance data taken from the TranStats data collection of the U.S. Department of Transportation (<html></html>On-Time<html></html>).<html></html> <html></html>The dataset covers the time period April-October 2013. Before uploading to Azure ML Studio, the dataset was processed as follows:<html></html><html></html>The dataset was filtered to cover only the 70 busiest airports in the continental US<html></html><html></html>Cancelled flights were labeled as delayed by more than 15 minutes<html></html><html></html>Diverted flights were filtered out<html></html><html></html>The following columns were selected: Year, Month, DayofMonth, DayOfWeek, Carrier, OriginAirportID, DestAirportID, CRSDepTime, DepDelay, DepDel15, CRSArrTime, ArrDelay, ArrDel15, Cancelled<html></html><html></html>
